overview:
Ryan Flannagan heads up the business team, which developed Myriad’s branding, channel marketing, and strategy. Myriad’s current project requirements tap into his technological skill set, drawing on his expertise in the latest programming techniques for Web 3.0 and A.I.R., such as Ruby on Rails, Action Script 3, Flex 3, Flash 8/CS3, Java Script, and CSS.

Mr. Flannagan assists in marketing, negotiations, operational management, and finance to ensure the company’s goals, objectives, and mission are being pursued and accomplished.
